entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Taskbar badge notifications for Windows apps #13994
    Backlog
  • Elements in ColumnDefinition with star width are not displayed when the Grid is in a StackLayout #13993
  • XAML Hot Reload is broken within Shell.TitleView #13992
    Backlog
  • Airplane Mode causes app to crash with no message #13991
    Backlog
  • Border does not change rendering when modifying StrokeShape properties #13988
    Backlog
  • Image.Shadow inconsistent on Android #13981
    Backlog
  • Adding new items to Shell.Current.Items or updating IsVisible on existing records does not re-render flyout menu #13980
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] Style applied to `Label` displays different if using `Text` or `FormattedText` #13977

Closed

  • [Android] Listview Header content disappears while scrolling #12312
    Backlog
  • AppThemeBinding not working well on macOS #11119
    Backlog
  • App.Current.RequestedThemeChanged doesn't fire #10310
    Backlog
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged has not be triggered on Mac #10055
    Backlog
  • Published version of app with Popups crashes #11976
  • File picker not work when publish MAUI as exe on Windows server 2019 +windows 10 #12052
  • Black screen with Maui Blazor Hybrid in Net 7 #13291
  • Building untrimmed application on Android on Release ends with Exception 'Unable to find Java.Lang.AbstractMethodError constructor' #7284
  • Modal Navigation does not work or throws exception prior to Window Creation/Parenting #8157
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android]VerticalStackLayout HorizontalOptions= Center is not working on Android #5119
    Backlog
  • Images 90 degrees rotated in iOS #13978
  • Slider Thumb Wrong in iOS, OK on Windows #8364
  • IPreference not initialized #13759
  • [Catalyst] Reusing Modal Page causes inner page contents to resize incorrectly, breaking page. #13697
    Backlog
  • Build Liberty failed (Partial method ) #8950
  • Using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms in Visual Studio says it does not have a strong name #13711

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that Grid is treating star rows/columns as Auto when unconstrained #13999
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager (#13689) #13998
    area/TabbedPage
  • [controls] fix cases a GC causes events to not fire #13997
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Removed Duplicate code in RadioButton.Tizen #13996
    area/controls 🎮, platform/tizen, partner/tizen
  • Fix issues with shell and pushing modals early #13990
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #13987
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/shell 🐢
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.230217.4 to 1.2.230313.1 #13984
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 #13983
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Fix Android ListView header / footer gone (#12312) #13712
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested, area/theme
  • [net7.0] Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #13989
    area/image :framed_picture:, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Fix a couple life cycle scenarios on shell modals #13986
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) (#11200) #13963
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13974
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix typo in PathBuilder.cs #13979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix ListProxy GC issues #13973

Updated

  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #13908
    area/controls 🎮, keyboard
  • Invalidate shapes changing any property inside the brushes (Fill, Stroke) #13905
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix memory leak in VisualElement.Shadow #13960
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix controls RTL issues #13672
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Reinstate WebView cookie functionality for Android & iOS #13736
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Essentials] Remove Task.Run from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Fix Shadow positions issues #13959
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Implement ScrollView Orientation #13657
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • [Android] Fixed SwipeItems size dynamically changing the Content Margin #13501
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Fix Picker alignment issues #13516
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
